outputs.output_descr:
•	Development of a comprehensive legal framework, bylaws and guidelines for MWM including the health care facilities and service providers.
•	Strengthening of institutional capacities regarding regulatory issues within the Environmental Quality Authority
•	Strengthening of management and operational capacities regarding medical waste management within the Ramallah Municipality and Ramallah Governmental Hospital;
•	 Identify the most appropriate management options and technology to manage and treat medical waste in Ramallah Governmental Hospital and apply it.
•	Supply of necessary equipment for Ramallah Governmental hospital and Ramallah Municipality.
•	Raise awareness among relevant staff of responsible bodies in specific, and the general public regarding medical waste management issues.

project_descr: improvement of the medical waste management in the west Bank
project_title: PAL/ Improvement of Medical Waste Management in Ramallah
